title: Bloomberg Markets: Payoneer CEO on Trends in Freelancer Income
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Payoneer CEO on Trends in Freelancer Income
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Scott H Galit\u0010Chief Executive Officer\u0010Payoneer Inc\u0010Discussing the state of pay for freelance workers around the world and how emering markets tend to pay freelancers better than the U.S.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
